reviewText: Read the 1 star reviews.  That's what I do when I want to really learn about a movie or product I am considering.  It amazes me some of the 1 stars I read: "I didn't like the photo on the disc."  "The movie was scratched I ordered another one."  "I thought Kirk Cameron was in this."  "I didn't know this was a boring documentary."  What?  What do any of those, except perhaps the last one have anything to do with your opinion of the movie?  :)Now consider this:This is a DOCUMENTARY...not a movie staring the incredibly handsome Kirk Cameron.  By the way, did you know that even when acting he will not kiss another woman other than his wife?  Call in the stunt lips ala Chelsea Noble.  Chelsea Noble is also an actress.  You may remember Kate MacDonald on the American television sitcom Growing Pains.This film is about sharing your FAITH.  That means you will hear words like: Bible, Jesus, God, Holy Spirit, Christian.  If those words offend you...then these words will terrify you, "Depart from me you worker of iniquity [sin] for I never knew you."  Who said that?  Jesus Christ of Nazareth.  Well, I don't believe in Jesus.  That's ok...you don't have to believe in Him.  Just like you do not have to believe I will shoot you with my 44 Magnum between your eyes. You don't believe me?  It don't really matter does it?This film does an EXCELLENT JOB in sharing God and the Bible and how you can have a relationship with Him.This film gives you great tools that you can use to win souls.Kirk Cameron does a great job and his buddy Evangelist Ray Comfort has a way with words...Comfort is a little short ( I think about 4' 9") If short people offend you then you may want to skip this movie.Kirk Cameron is rather handsome...probably more handsome than you...if handsome people offend you...then you may not want to watch this film.If you are saved and know the Lord this film will convict you for not doing what the Bible commands us.  If being convicted offends you...you may want to find a nice Family movie.If you are a heathen and do not know the Lord then you will come face to face with a decision.  If being confronted with decisions...and what is the most important decision of your life then...YOU NEED TO GET THIS MOVIE AND WATCH IT IMMEDIATELY.I highly recommend this film.  Get it,...watch it in your church group...discuss the tools...go into the streets and use them.  God Bless you!!!!P.S. Every has a right to their own opinion.  As long as at the end of the day they realize that MY opinion was the only one right. :) LOL Just kidding.  Congressman [President- Founding Father] John Adams, "I don't know why no one likes me...I am always right."  No...I'm right Mr. President. hehe
Title: N/A

reviewText: I received it super fast, new condition as described and well packaged. The movie was not what I thought, I didn't realize it was a documentary but even some documentaries are interesting. I could not pay attention to it and just could never watch the whole thing. Not at all what I expected from a Kirk Cameron movie.

reviewText: ...and lent it to others.  I never had a chance to watch it.  I lent it to a friend and it was passed along.  That's a good thing.  It was good enough to share and still hasn't made its way back to me.  That's one of the basic tenants of Christianity, to share to Gospel.  The DVD worked.
summary: It must be good because someone borrowed it...

reviewText: Jesus does love us.  He is close and personal and cares so much about our eternal being.  He made a way to pull us out of our despair and give us eternal life.  Believing in nothing instead of him is so pointless and depressing and hopeless.  Why even live or do anything with a life so short if there is no eternal impact?  Our decisions here impact our eternity!  I wish thus DVD were longer because it is so good.
summary: Jesus is the only God that loves his creation personally and makes a way for us to be with him.

summary: Love Ray Comfort and Kirk Cameron
Title: N/A

reviewText: I am one of those folks who just can sense when three people would be perfect together. And I just know that there is a day coming when I will meet Ray and Kirk and we will all hug and be one with the lord on his most high.Ray is a big fan of Jesus and he doesn't let his poor choices in facial hair get him down. Ray is a nice man, but sometimes he can be a bit full of himself in my opinion. I hope Kirk Cameron finds his way back to being a Hollywood star who can make money from acting gigs instead of hiding in religion and false prophets. He has such a beautiful wife that I hope she isn't disillusioned by the falling income or how boring and self-righteous Kirk can be at times.I also hope KIrk has gotten over his failure at the USC college where those students made him look so ridiculous. One thing I've learned is that education makes you dumb. Typical left-wing intellectual baloney and using logic in an argument is never allowed in the "Comfort Zone."I am thinking about trademarking that phrase "The Comfort Zone." I heard NBA basketball coach Pat Riley made millions from trademarking "three-peat" so I just want to cash in on my intellectual property as I have bills to pay and my dang car is on her last legs.
summary: Jesus spoke to me in a dream and he said Kirk Cameroon is my favorite and Ray Comfort is so fit
